A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie has some great flickers of greatness\, but is ultimately weighed down be less the mediocre understanding of characters both new and old and a reverence for the new trilogies arch or the saga as a whole.

Rain Johnson would have been a great choice to direct a one off or his upcoming trilogy\, the casino world was a total showstopper and felt like a hamfisted prequal era holdover\, and way to say "look\, I get Star Wars is for kids... right?".

I could go on\, but I'll let redlettermedia do it or any other critic who isn't in disneys pocket.
